mapper.select: /* com.lj.core.common.code.CodeMapper.selectRegionListForRegionHandler */ SELECT RGN.RGN_CD , RGN.OPRT_YN , RGN.MLT_CTY_YN , RGN.USE_YN , RNM.LANG_CD , RNM.RGN_NM FROM TB_RGN RGN JOIN TB_RGN_NM RNM ON RGN.RGN_CD = RNM.RGN_CD LEFT JOIN TB_CMM_CD_DTL CD ON CD.CTGR_CD = 'CMM001' AND RNM.LANG_CD = CD.DTL_CD ORDER BY RGN.ST_SEQ ASC, CD.ST_SEQ ASC

/* com.lj.core.common.code.CodeMapper.selectCountryListForCountryHandler */ SELECT CTR.IATA_COUNTRY_CODE AS CTR_CD , CTR.RGN_CD , CTR.ISO_2_LETTER_COUNTRY_CODE AS CTR_CD_2_LTR , CTR.IBS_POP_CD , CTR.CRNC_CD , CTR.CTR_NO , CTR.GMT_VLU , CTR.OPRT_YN , CTR.USE_YN , CNM.LANG_CD , CNM.CTR_NM FROM TB_CTR CTR JOIN TB_CTR_NM CNM ON CTR.IATA_COUNTRY_CODE = CNM.IATA_COUNTRY_CODE LEFT JOIN TB_CMM_CD_DTL CD ON CD.CTGR_CD = 'CMM001' AND CNM.LANG_CD = CD.DTL_CD LEFT JOIN TB_RGN RGN ON CTR.RGN_CD = RGN.RGN_CD ORDER BY RGN.ST_SEQ ASC, CTR.IATA_COUNTRY_CODE ASC, CD.ST_SEQ ASC

/* com.lj.core.common.code.CodeMapper.selectCountryLanguageListForCountryHandler */ SELECT CTR.IATA_COUNTRY_CODE AS CTR_CD , CLN.LANG_CD FROM TB_CTR CTR JOIN TB_CTR_LANG CLN ON CTR.IATA_COUNTRY_CODE = CLN.IATA_COUNTRY_CODE JOIN TB_CMM_CD_DTL CD ON CD.CTGR_CD = 'CMM001' AND CLN.LANG_CD = CD.DTL_CD ORDER BY CTR.IATA_COUNTRY_CODE ASC, CD.ST_SEQ ASC

/* com.lj.core.common.code.CodeMapper.selectCityAirportListForCityAirportHandler */ SELECT APO.IATA_CTY_APO_CD AS APO_CD , APO.RGN_CD , APO.IATA_COUNTRY_CODE AS CTR_CD , APO.DRCT_FLT_YN , APO.MLT_CTY_YN , APO.USE_YN , ANM.LANG_CD , ANM.APO_NM FROM TB_CTY_APO APO JOIN TB_APO_NM ANM ON APO.IATA_CTY_APO_CD = ANM.IATA_CTY_APO_CD LEFT JOIN TB_CMM_CD_DTL CD ON CD.CTGR_CD = 'CMM001' AND ANM.LANG_CD = CD.DTL_CD LEFT JOIN TB_RGN RGN ON APO.RGN_CD = RGN.RGN_CD ORDER BY RGN.ST_SEQ ASC, APO.IATA_CTY_APO_CD ASC, CD.ST_SEQ ASC

/* com.lj.core.common.code.CodeMapper.selectCityAirportListByDeparture */ SELECT APO.IATA_CTY_APO_CD AS APO_CD , APO.RGN_CD , APO.IATA_COUNTRY_CODE AS CTR_CD , APO.DRCT_FLT_YN , APO.MLT_CTY_YN , APO.USE_YN , ANM.LANG_CD , ANM.APO_NM FROM TB_CTY_APO APO JOIN TB_APO_NM ANM ON APO.IATA_CTY_APO_CD = ANM.IATA_CTY_APO_CD LEFT JOIN TB_CMM_CD_DTL CD ON CD.CTGR_CD = 'CMM001' AND ANM.LANG_CD = CD.DTL_CD LEFT JOIN TB_RGN RGN ON APO.RGN_CD = RGN.RGN_CD LEFT JOIN TB_DEP_APO DEP ON APO.IATA_CTY_APO_CD = DEP.DEPARTURE_APO_IATA_CTY_APO_CD ORDER BY RGN.ST_SEQ ASC, DEP.DEP_APO_SEQ ASC, CD.ST_SEQ ASC

/* com.lj.core.common.code.CodeMapper.selectDepartureAirportList */ SELECT DEP.DEP_APO_SEQ , APO.RGN_CD , APO.IATA_COUNTRY_CODE AS CTR_CD , APO.IATA_CTY_APO_CD AS APO_CD , ANM.LANG_CD , ANM.APO_NM , DEP.USE_YN , DEP.ST_SEQ FROM TB_DEP_APO DEP LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CTY_APO APO ON DEP.DEPARTURE_APO_IATA_CTY_APO_CD = APO.IATA_CTY_APO_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_APO_NM ANM ON APO.IATA_CTY_APO_CD = ANM.IATA_CTY_APO_CD WHERE DEP.USE_YN = 'Y' AND DEP.APCT_STRT_DT <= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AND DEP.APCT_END_DT >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') ORDER BY DEP.ST_SEQ ASC

/* com.lj.core.common.code.CodeMapper.selectArrivalAirportList */ SELECT ARV.DEP_APO_SEQ , APO.RGN_CD , APO.IATA_COUNTRY_CODE AS CTR_CD , APO.IATA_CTY_APO_CD AS APO_CD , ANM.LANG_CD , ANM.APO_NM , SEQ.ST_SEQ FROM TB_DEP_APO DEP JOIN TB_ARVL_APO ARV ON DEP.DEP_APO_SEQ = ARV.DEP_APO_SEQ JOIN TB_DEP_APO SEQ ON ARV.ARRIVAL_APO_IATA_CTY_APO_CD = SEQ.DEPARTURE_APO_IATA_CTY_APO_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CTY_APO APO ON ARV.ARRIVAL_APO_IATA_CTY_APO_CD = APO.IATA_CTY_APO_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_APO_NM ANM ON APO.IATA_CTY_APO_CD = ANM.IATA_CTY_APO_CD WHERE DEP.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY DEP.ST_SEQ ASC, SEQ.ST_SEQ ASC

/* com.lj.core.common.code.CodeMapper.selectMessageListForMessageHandler */ SELECT MSG.MSG_CD , DTL.LANG_CD , MSG.USE_YN , DTL.ERR_NM AS MSG_NM , DTL.ERR_MSG AS MSG_CTN FROM TB_CMM_MSG MSG JOIN TB_CMM_MSG_DTL DTL ON MSG.MSG_CD = DTL.MSG_CD ORDER BY MSG.MSG_CD ASC, DTL.LANG_CD ASC
/* com.lj.core.common.code.CodeMapper.selectHolidaytForCodeHandler */ SELECT COUNTRY, YMD, YMD_NAME, COLOR FROM TB_CMM_HOLIDAY WHERE YMD >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') ORDER BY YMD
